remarks.para: The member name starts with the member type character and a colon.

GetMemberName.summary: Retrieves the member name from the DocMember name.

GetNamespace.summary: Retrieves the namespace from the DocMember name.

GetFields.summary: Gets the Field members for the current Type member.
GetFields.returns: A DocMembers collection of field members.

GetMethods.summary: Gets the Method members for the current Type member.
GetMethods.returns: A DocMembers collection of method members.

GetProperties.summary: Gets the Property members for the current Type member.
GetProperties.returns: A DocMembers collection of property members.

GetTypes.summary: Gets the Type members for the current Doc assembly.
GetTypes.returns: A DocMembers collection of type members.
